README-thredds-servers.txt
[jgflemin@adcircvis home]$ cat /etc/fstab
# HEADER: This file was autogenerated at Thu Aug 10 19:32:00 -0500 2017
# HEADER: by puppet.  While it can still be managed manually, it
# HEADER: is definitely not recommended.

#
# /etc/fstab
# Created by anaconda on Fri Jun  6 08:20:11 2014
#
# Accessible filesystems, by reference, are maintained under '/dev/disk'
# See man pages fstab(5), findfs(8), mount(8) and/or blkid(8) for more info
#
/dev/mapper/myvg-rootvol	/	ext4	defaults	1	1
UUID=a26f0c0b-4ae1-46de-b8c7-778d46fdf2d4	/boot	ext3	defaults	1	2
UUID=2702c5f6-b0f6-4db0-ba2b-f02588366aca	swap	swap	defaults	0	0
tmpfs	/dev/shm	tmpfs	defaults	0	0
devpts	/dev/pts	devpts	gid=5,mode=620	0	0
sysfs	/sys	sysfs	defaults	0	0
proc	/proc	proc	defaults	0	0
129.114.52.102:/gpfs/corral3/tacc/utexas/hurricane/ASGS	/hurricane	nfs	rw,nosuid,noatime,vers=3,rsize=1048576,wsize=1048576,namelen=255,soft,tcp,addr=129.114.52.102	0	0


[jgflemin@adcircvis home]$ cat /etc/fstab
# HEADER: This file was autogenerated at Thu Aug 10 19:32:00 -0500 2017
# HEADER: by puppet.  While it can still be managed manually, it
# HEADER: is definitely not recommended.

#
# /etc/fstab
# Created by anaconda on Fri Jun  6 08:20:11 2014
#
# Accessible filesystems, by reference, are maintained under '/dev/disk'
# See man pages fstab(5), findfs(8), mount(8) and/or blkid(8) for more info
#
/dev/mapper/myvg-rootvol	/	ext4	defaults	1	1
UUID=a26f0c0b-4ae1-46de-b8c7-778d46fdf2d4	/boot	ext3	defaults	1	2
UUID=2702c5f6-b0f6-4db0-ba2b-f02588366aca	swap	swap	defaults	0	0
tmpfs	/dev/shm	tmpfs	defaults	0	0
devpts	/dev/pts	devpts	gid=5,mode=620	0	0
sysfs	/sys	sysfs	defaults	0	0
proc	/proc	proc	defaults	0	0
129.114.52.102:/gpfs/corral3/tacc/utexas/hurricane/ASGS	/hurricane	nfs	rw,nosuid,noatime,vers=3,rsize=1048576,wsize=1048576,namelen=255,soft,tcp,addr=129.114.52.102	0	0

/usr/local/apache-tomcat-7.0.54
